Name: Calvados Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Apple is somewhat dominated by orange but a pleasing dry, zesty, fruity combo nonetheless.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Calvados Cocktail contains 165 calories
